snippet: Jon Jones, the U.F.C. light heavyweight champion, injured his leg, forcing the postponement of his Sept. 27 title fight with Daniel Cormier to Jan. 3.
abstract: UFC light heavyweight champion Jon Jones injures his leg, forcing postponement of his September title fight with Daniel Cormier to January 2015.
lead_paragraph: Jon Jones, the U.F.C. light heavyweight champion, injured his leg, forcing the postponement of his Sept. 27 title fight with Daniel Cormier to Jan. 3.
